name: getproductsku
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool price_tracker_south_africa.
Tool description: Get prices of products at a number of South African retailers by searching the barcodes, product ID's  / Product Sku's or product page URL's
API description: Fetches price information for a product identified by its SKU from the RapidAPI price tracker service.

product_sku.description: The SKU (Stock Keeping Unit) of the product to retrieve price information for.
